derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French tresorier, from tresor (see treasure), influenced by late Latin thesaurarius

entry.tran: 司库;财务主管;会计;出纳
entry.def: The treasurer of a society or organization is the person who is in charge of its finances and keeps its accounts.

means.word_mean: 1. an officer charged with receiving and disbursing funds
